desc: Here at Power Appliance we save are customers money! We offer major appliances at a fraction of the cost. Our inventory of new, used, scratched and dented appliances are fit to meet everyone's budget. Our friendly staff looks forward to assist.

layout.text: Here at Power Appliance we save are customers money! We offer major appliances at a fraction of the cost. Our inventory of new, pre-owned, scratched and dented appliances are fit to meet everyone's budget. We are located in the beautiful city of Twinsburg, Ohio. Our friendly staff looks forward to assisting you with your home appliance needs.
